original: AVOID SCAMS AND FRAUD BY DEALING LOCALLY
translated: 为避免上当受骗，请选择同城交易！

original: Are there any other regular patrons of the Clam Palace out there?  Anybody driving from the Varsity Heights area to East Bohan around 1 AM on Friday or Saturday night?  Or driving back around 5am?  I'll be honest with you.  I've been in denial for too long.  I'm in love with a stripper.  Yes, I know what you're going to say.  She's playing me like a grand piano.  She's just telling a lonely middle-aged man what he wants to hear.  Well, you haven't seen the way Anastasia looks back at me through her legs.  I know what love feels like - there's no mistaking that warm feeling in the base of the colon when she does that hang-upside-down-from-the-pole thing.  Every weekend, I promise myself I won't go to the Clam Palace and then half a bottle of whisky later, I'm lying in the back of a taxi with a pocketful of 20s from my mom's purse jerking off.  It's costing me a fortune.  I'm a couple of lap dances away from bankruptcy.  Not to mention the tips!  And the flowers.  And the hepatitis.  And the long distance calls she makes from my cell to her brother in Riga.  I can't stand the thought of her with other men.  I'll slit her throat.  Please get in touch if you can help me out.  I'll throw in gas money and I'm a great conversationalist.  Deep, but accessible.  If you haven't been to the Clam Palace, it's by far the best strip club in Liberty City.  And I should know.  In fact, it's probably the classiest joint I've ever been to.  Period.  The private rooms are clean, for the most part, and sides are definitely on the menu.  Just stay away from Anastasia.  Seriously, I'll slit your throat.
translated: 有Clam Palace的常客吗？有人周五周六凌晨一点左右从Varsity Heights附近去东Bohan吗？五点返程的也行？跟你说实话吧，我自己也不太相信，但我和一个脱衣舞女陷入热恋了。是，我知道你想说什么。「你被她玩弄于股掌之间」「她对所有寂寞的中年男人都这么说」那是因为你没见过Anastasia从两腿之间看我时的样子。我知道爱情的感觉，她在钢管上做出那个倒挂的动作时，从我腹部深处传来的那种感觉绝对是真爱。每周末，我都会发誓绝对不去Clam Palace。然后半瓶威士忌下肚，我就带着一裤兜从我妈钱包里摸来的20块钞票坐在出租车后排了。花了我不少钱啊。再去看几次表演我就要破产了。更别说打赏小费了！还有送花。还有肝炎。还有她用我的手机给拉脱维亚的哥哥打电话的漫游费。一想到她可能跟别的男人在一起我就受不了。我会抹了她的脖子。能帮忙的话请联系我。我会付你油钱，而且我很会聊天。深沉，但又易懂。如果你没去过Clam Palace，我可以告诉你，这是自由城目前最好的脱衣舞俱乐部。我自己也清楚的。其实吧，这可能是我去过的最上档次的店了。不多说了。私人包厢很干净，大部分是干净的，服务全都是明码标价的。你别碰Anastasia就行了。真的，敢碰她我杀了你。
